company_values.description: Take responsibility for tasks, outcomes, and problems. Act like an owner and proactively solve issues.
Continuously seek new knowledge, ask questions, and explore better ways of doing things. Stay open-minded and eager to improve.
Always prioritize customer needs, satisfaction, and long-term trust. Make decisions that create value for customers.
Look beyond short-term or small goals. Aim for bold, ambitious solutions that can create large-scale impact.
Stay dedicated to your work. Lead by example daily, showing consistency, responsibility, and initiative.
Prefer taking quick, thoughtful action over waiting too long. Make progress even when full information isn't available.
Stay persistent through challenges and setbacks. Keep going despite difficulties or failures.
Understand and consider the feelings, perspectives, and situations of others. Act with kindness and compassion.
Be honest, ethical, and transparent. Do the right thing even when it's hard or when no one is watching.
Accept feedback and criticism without defensiveness. Use it as a tool for growth and self-improvement.
